title: Start Of The Exam (Part 1)
body:
Start Of The Exam (Part 1)

Evan left the city plaza after selling the body of the ice troll.

Because its blood is one of the main ingredients in making healing potions Evan got one hundred thousand credits just for the body.

He could have gotten much more if not for the fact that he had blown away its head.

Along with the ice troll's body, he also sold the body of the C rank wolf that he killed in the wilderness last time.

That C rank body of the wolf was sold for fifteen thousand credits.

Even though it was even less than the body of the black ogre that he sold at thirty thousand credits he was satisfied, because unlike the body of the black ogre the body of the wolf was quite damaged, and its body is less useful than the black ogre.

After coming out from the plaza Evan saw a burger shop and decide to buy one for himself.

The name of the burger shop was.... Extraordinary burgers.
